name: Maria Renards Revenge
overview: Maria Renard's Revenge is an Amiga Castlevania fan game developed by Domkid using the Scorpion Engine. You play as Maria Renard, she is a young vampire huntress, daughter of distant kinship with the House of Belmont, who has to traverse through dangerous landscapes and fight many monsters, while defending herself with the use of a bird that protects her from harm...
